text: KFPW-FM is an American commercial radio station located in Barling, Arkansas, broadcasting to the Fort Smith, Arkansas, area on 94.5 FM. KFPW-FM airs an active rock music format from Citadel Media's The Nerve and is branded as "The Fort 94.5". ==External links== * FPW Category:Active rock radio stations in the United States Category:Fort Smith metropolitan area Category:1990s establishments in Arkansas Category:Year of establishment missing
title: KFPW-FM
